Reviews.Title: “An extremely good find in Paris”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel september 2011 6 nights 3 business 3 pleasure relatively simple downsides cheap rack rate 3 hotel paris expensive times exchange rate pretty poor moment barely access free wireless internet 6th floor 62 wasnt issue half stay fairly essential feature managed cobble weak signal remotely tethering smartphone giving flexibility picking network confined 6th floor ive idea easily solved adding extra routers theres floor breakfast isnt brilliant value €8 id grab nearby patisseries people below reviewer opposite depends outlook upsides outweigh downsides exceptionally clean tended day decent size paris youre sizes shock system paris relatively roomy recently refurbished traveller photos ive seen huge change makes feel nice staff fantastic cant praise highly location pretty leisurely 5 minute walk road alesia metro station easy stops youre rer links gare du nord cdg etc walk jean moulin dorleans tube metro stations road shorter plenty eat drink nearby dont head afield awesome steak unassuming looking jardins couple minutes walk alesia metro station av du location nice av jean moulin quiet street little activity 30 degrees save rubbish collection morning noise vicinity windows wide ive probably forgotten plus lots im experience earlier reviewer €8 breakfast option conveyed option leave daily basis id absolutely hesitation heading hotel fantastic
